content: Files uploaded here will be indexed and used as context in the AI-Chat tab. Add files to ask AI about them, generate content, or analyze information together.

comment.text: This text explains the purpose of the AI-Chat tab's file upload area. It informs users that uploaded files will be used as context for AI interactions, allowing them to ask questions, generate content, or analyze information. This description appears in the AI-Chat tab when no files have been uploaded.
